Privacy and Personal Data Protection Policy

Who is this Policy for?

When another company uses Modjo, RINGO acts as a processor.
The information about the processing of personal data that this other company performs through Modjo is provided directly by that company and may be different from that provided in this Policy.

In the course of recruiting, RINGO may share candidate information with outside organizations involved in recruiting candidates (subcontractors) such as recruiting firms or SaaS-based recruitment software.
